description: Adds a cooldown to a mob. The intention of this cooldown is to be used to prevent the mob from attempting to aquire new attack targets.
title: Attack Cooldown

attack_cooldown_time.title: Attack Cooldown Time
attack_cooldown_time.description: Amount of time in seconds for the cooldown. Can be specified as a number or a pair of numbers (min and max).

attack_cooldown_complete_event.title: Event: On Attack Cooldown Complete
attack_cooldown_complete_event.description: Event to be runned when the cooldown is complete.
